titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the active business definition under section 355.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the active business definition under section 355.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, concerning the active business definition relating to distributions of stock and securities of a controlled corporation, to treat all corporations that are members of the same affiliated group as a single corporation.
